A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Like Rian Johnson's Looper\, The Last Jedi has serious issues of pacing and gaping holes of logic. Whoever signed off on this script needs to be fired.\n\nThere are nuggets of greatness in this movie. Unfortunately\, you have to wade through too much crap to enjoy it. This movie is only slightly better than the Ep1\,2\,3 prequels. Worst of the recent three.
